list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small piece of paper, fabric, plastic, or similar material attached to an object and giving information about it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the alcohol content is clearly stated on the label
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hàm lượng cồn được nêu rõ trên nhãn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a classifying phrase or name applied to a person or thing, especially one that is inaccurate or restrictive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my reluctance to stick a label on myself politically
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự miễn cưỡng của tôi để dán nhãn một cách chính trị

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a narrow horizontal strip, typically with three downward projections, that is superimposed on a coat of arms by an eldest son during the life of his father.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she labeled the parcels neatly, writing the addresses in capital letters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy dán nhãn các bưu kiện gọn gàng, viết các địa chỉ bằng chữ in hoa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: assign to a category, especially inaccurately or restrictively.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the critics labeled him a loser
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các nhà phê bình có nhãn cho anh ta một kẻ thua cuộc
